item.title: This One Trick Will Change the Way You Use Your iPhone 12 Pro Max - Here's How to Put Screen Record On It!
item.description: Introduction The iPhone 12 Pro Max is one of the most advanced and powerful smartphones on the market. It features a stunning 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR OLED display, a powerful A14 Bionic processor, and an impressive triple-camera system. With all these features, itâ€™s no wonder why the iPhone 12 Pro Max is so popular. But did you know that the iPhone 12 Pro Max also has a powerful feature called Screen Record?
